column5: Well this Spring has been good to me so far with lots of fish being landed ...fished Laker's the past few trips with clients and all I can say is wow there is some hogs out there  this year ...not many small Lake Trout kicking around average size has been 14 to 24 lbs ...if your looking to fish Lake Ontario and get some big fish now is  the time to get the boat out ...I have been fishing the Niagara Bar from 65 to 250 fow Riggers  have been the best dragging Bottom for Laker's and 80 to 150 ft down for the Kings ...Glow spoons seem to be the ticket ..
Those are beauts!! What is your opinion on the state of the chinook fishery these days? Are the numbers and sizes still there?
Good fish there.  Both the salmon and trout look big and healthy.  nice job.
What a surprise! Not very often one opens a post and sees his favorite aunt and uncle with some nice fish in their hands. You had some very special people with you as guests that day.
Good but can  be better ...but now with Pens being entered on our side of the lake things are looking better
Great report and pics Fishmaster Looks like you guys had a blast out there.... Congratulations to all involved Real hogs Thanks for sharing Leechman
